name: Billy's Jungle Adventure
description:
Billy's Jungle Adventure is a classic platform jungle run. You will be going into a thrilling world to recuse your princess.
In this adventure, you must jump and run over obstacles, also must smash enemies, climb up huge stairs and mountains, and explore castles.
Playing it will bring your childhood back with old-school gameplay.

HOW TO PLAY:

- Use Buttons to Move, Jump and Attack.
- Use power-up items to achieve special power.
- Collect coins to buy items, skins, special weapons.

GAME FEATURES:

- Beautiful graphics design.
- Classic style retro game.
- Simple and straightforward gameplay.
